features: PATENTED, DOCTOR-DEVELOPED FORMULA - Dr. Eduardo Dolhun developed DripDrop to help with dehydration where IV therapy wasn’t available. The invention was such a breakthrough DripDrop’s formula received a U.S. Patent, and Dr. Dolhun was awarded the 2017 Mayo Clinic Alumni Association Humanitarian Award. And now, as a Public Benefit Corporation on a mission to defeat dehydration globally, we use your purchases to generate life-saving donations of DripDrop to those who need it most.

ORS ELECTROLYTE POWDER - DripDrop’s patented formula uses ORS science to activate a hydration shortcut known as the sodium-glucose cotransport system. Accelerating fluid absorption into the bloodstream 2-3x so you can feel better faster. And, unlike most electrolyte drink mixes, it tastes amazing.

3X THE ELECTROLYTES & ½ THE SUGAR OF SPORTS DRINKS - Our patented formula delivers aid fast when you need it most. With a precise ratio of sodium electrolytes and glucose. As well as potassium, magnesium, zinc, and vitamin C for maximum immune support.

GREAT FOR SIGNS OF DEHYDRATION CAUSED BY WORKOUT, TRAVEL & HEAT EXHAUSTION – Dehydration affects 75% of people daily, negatively impacting both physical and mental performance. Stay hydrated and recover faster from dehydration resulting from heat, exercise, and more.
UNMATCHABLE FLAVOR - Finally, a fast and effective solution that tastes amazing. Just mix our hydration powder with 8 ounces of water to taste (and feel) the difference for yourself.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dehydration profoundly affects your health, mood, and performance. DripDrop is a fast, low-cost, alternative for mild to moderate dehydration. Dr. Eduardo Dolhun developed DripDrop to help with dehydration. When he saw how quickly patients recovered, without the use of an IV, he thought…why shouldn’t everyone have this? Now, this powerful formula is available to you. The invention of DripDrop was such a breakthrough, the formula received a U.S. Patent. DripDrop contains the sodium electrolyte levels and lower glucose content required to facilitate fast fluid absorption, AND it tastes great. It’s a powerhouse against dehydration that checks all the boxes.

Everyday Dehydration 75% of people in the US are dehydrated every day, and even mild dehydration increases your risk of injury and inhibits your ability to get things done. Trusted by Pros DripDrop combines efficacy, portability, and great taste to deliver dehydration relief fast. It’s trusted for those who need it most – medical professionals, the U.S. military, firefighters, and pro athletes. On a Mission We are a Public Benefit Corporation on a mission to defeat dehydration at home and abroad. Your DripDrop purchase generates donations to those who need it most.
FDA Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Better than other Hydration products
reviews.reviewText: This works ao well and so quickly. I will never go back to sports drinks or other hydration products. The taste is superior as well. Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These taste great and really help after a night of drinking. I used these on a cruise and would wake up the next day feeling refreshed and hydrated. I continue to use them now whenever I’m feeling like I need a hydration boost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Alternative for Hydration Drinks!
reviews.reviewText: I'm picky about my drinks when it comes to hydration. My biggest problem is that water is boring. Gatorade is fine but it gets boring after a while, and not all flavors are appealing. Not to mention, half of all hydration drinks out there use artificial sweeteners, which are distracting and annoying to people who don't like the artificial sweetener taste (like myself).I would suggest these little packets for 8oz water bottles. I use 2 for 16-20 oz at a time. It makes a strong drink, and although there is a little bit of aspartate in them, I don't get the artificial sweetener taste at all.They have massive flavor, sodium, and the other re-hydrating additives that you need when sweating. You may not feel good drinking these while watching TV because that's not what they're for. It's for ACTIVE re-hydration, so when you're sweating, this is the helper and my new go-to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally was going to purchase Liquid IV because summertime is finally rolling around and I wanted to be prepared for those days of being out in the sun and sweating. I really just wanted to stay hydrated and feel healthy without worrying about heat sickness or anything of that nature.When I saw the price of Liquid IVs, I said, "nope." and continued looking for other comparable options that didn't cost more than a week's worth of groceries. So, I stumbled across DripDrop. Honestly, I don't think this product is that bad. I just don't know if I will purchase again right now. Here is why. The flavors are fine, but they are definitely basic and not anything extraordinarily delicious. You have your citrus flavors, your berry, and a watermelon. I liked them all equally. By all means, if those flavors sound good, definitely try this product. The reason why I'm not so sure I'll keep buying these powders is that I genuinely think you can hydrate pretty well just by making sure you consistently drink water and make sure you have some salt and sugar coming into your system here and there too. That is really what these packets seem to be, just salt and sugar with some flavor. Because I'm cheap, I think I might just stick with water with a pinch of salt and sugar thrown in. This is just my feelings on this. If you are going to get one of these powdered hydration products, DripDrop seems as good as any.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for cruise and FSA
reviews.reviewText: I had a sinus infection prior to my cruis. I purchased these since I couldn't take Core water with me. I love all the flavors. The best part I purchased using my FSA card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dehydration headaches solved
reviews.reviewText: These little hydration powders are a lifesaver. I try to drink a lot of water throughout the day but sometimes I feel like my body isn’t absorbing it. As in drinking a lot of water will make me pee more but I may still suffer from lethargy, headaches or dry mouth. These packets are incredible at solving that issue. I was a fan of Liquid IV brand and love few of those flavors but they were larger servings and had a ton of sugar. These servings are smaller but still pack enough of a flavor punch where I don’t even need to add a whole packet to a standard water bottle for it to taste great. Because the package has less in each than the Liquid IVs, there’s half as much sugar and it still gets the job done. It gets rid of my dehydration headaches within about five minutes of consumption. The flavors are also all really good in these. I would mix the lemon or orange ones in with my preworkout on particularly hot days when I anticipated sweating a lot and it mixed well. The only flavor I didn’t love was the watermelon, which was a few of my friends favorite flavor so that’s probably just attributed to my personal taste. Highly recommend this product for lower sugar and more affordable hydration supplementation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have product
reviews.reviewText: Dehydration can easily happen when you lest expect it, often on off hours when no store is open. This product is great to use when you or a love one has failed to drink fluids, especially during an illness or an athletic event. Recently, a family member got dizzy and fatigued and I realized that he had become dehydrated. Fortunately, I had been given a package of dripdrop and was so pleased how quickly he responded. I then ordered a box from Amazon so that we will not be without this product. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Contains sucralose that can cause diarrhea
reviews.reviewText: I'm writing this review just to mention that it contains sucralose, which can cause stomach upset and diarrhea in some users.
